author: Silvana Franco
method: Place the sugar, lime rind and juice and the lemongrass stalks in a pan with 150ml (Â¼ pint) water. Heat gently, stirring until the sugar dissolves then simmer gently for 5 minutes then allow to cool completely.  Strain the liquid into a rigid container then stir in the vodka and soda water. Freeze for 2 hours until almost firm then using a fork, break the mixture into large flaky crystals.
ingredients: 175g caster sugar,  juice and grated rind 8 limes,  2 lemon grass stalks, roughly flattened with a rolling pin,  150ml vodka,  300ml soda water
